Do you mean that the center of lift indicator is jumping around when your aircraft is in different rotations? I think the center of lift indicator assumes an airflow coming from the front of the hangar, and in the VAB it assumes an airflow from the top of the building. If you point your aircraft forward and rotate the whole thing slightly with shift+w/s you can see this. That's why the the indicator changes a lot when you rotate your craft 90 degrees at a time.
